basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a BBA in Management Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Assist with administrative operations for the EWC Research department
highlights: Provide ongoing administrative support to program assistants, driving organizational success through the management of daily operations and special projects
Collaborated with OWL staff to successfully manage multiphase and multi-million dollar Esports tournament at the highest level
Worked closely with logistic specialists to monitor highly classified security and broadcast systems
Adjusted project plans to account for operational specifications with minimal risk and zero cost overruns

volunteer.summary: Delta Sigma Pi is a co-ed professional business fraternity organized to foster the study of business in universities
highlights: Responsible for helping to plan and execute various social events of between 50 and 500 attendees
